TestDescription.name: Cross site scripting vulnerability in Uploadify SWF
TestDescription.Description: Uploadify is a jQuery plugin that integrates a fully-customizable multiple file upload utility on your website. Multiple cross site scripting vulnerabilities were reported in older versions of the Uploadify SWF that may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary Javascript code.
TestDescription.Impact: Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them. An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user. It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of Uploadify.
